Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: I bought this season and season 1 expecting poor quality video on these DVDS, but that is far from the actual case. I'm currently watching some episodes right now of season 2 and It looks like the video has been cleaned up a bit. I am extremely proud that I've been able to buy this for myself and it's a part of classic television for not only Nick, but television in general. The Memories and innocence of this show forever remains a part of my childhood. I have no complaints in regards to the DVDS, except that the menu is pretty basic and lacks extra features. I'm very pleased either way. It's a great buy for anyone that has been a fan of this Show since the 90's and for future generations! I wish that I lived in Bluffington!
Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: I watch Doug daily when I was growing up and this is a great way to get see those shows again!  Love that it is an Amazon Prime streaming item!  Always thought Doug was a good show and and had good values and he learned a valuable lesson in the process.

Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: The adventures of Nick's Doug continues in Season 2.  Doug continues to live his life in the suburbs of Bluffington with the help of his family, friends and alter egos (i.e. Quailman, Smash Adams, etc.)For those of you who are definitely Doug fans, you can tell the difference in the show's animation.  That's because most to all of the animation was sent overseas to France's Ellipse Programme, but it shouldn't deter you from watching it.Some of the memorable episodes are:-Doug's Dinner Date-Doug's Secret Admirer-Doug vs. the Klotzoid Zombies-Doug Lucky Hat (the music score's a definite must-listen)-Doug's Lost Weekend-Doug's Worst Nightmare-Doug's Dental DisasterI highly recommend this (along with Doug-Season 1).  Lord-willing, Nickelodeon and Amazon.com will finally release the final season soon.A definite hit for fans and the whole family!
Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: Such a good show. I remember watching these back in the 90s. Tv isn't like that anymore. It's wonderful that I was able to find these shows on Amazon.
Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: This is an Amazon exclusive and won't be sold in stores. Amazon worked out a deal with nickelodeon to "Burn on demand" meaning upon receiving an order that Amazon will create the dvd and insert then ship it to the buyer...Doug's season-2 disc set includes 3 dvd's that have a total of 26 episodes, Audio and picture quality in these dvd's are excellentDisc-11.Doug takes the case (Doug tries solving the case involving Beebe's missing radio)2.Doug's secret song (Doug is worried that Patti may watch a music video he had made declaring his love for her)3.Doug's got no gift (Doug tries making Patti a birthday present after he waste all his money and can't afford the beet-ball he originally wanted to buy her)4.Doug vs the klotzoid zombies (Klotzenstein turns everyone into zombies with his zombie chips and its up to Quail-man to save them)5.Doug's secret admirer  (Doug starts receiving admiring notes in his school locker from a mystery girl that he hopes will be Patti)6.Doug's on tv (Doug and Skeeter go on the kiddie show "Kiddie korral" and get humiliated after Roger tapes it and plans to show it to everyone in school)7.Doug's dinner date (Doug hates liver and onions but does everything he can to make himself like it, even hypnosis - in time for Patti's dinner party)8.Doug meets fentruck9.Doug's on stage10.Doug's worst nightmare (Doug's worst nightmare as Roger falls for his sister Judy)Disc-21.Doug's derby delemma2.Doug's on his own3.Doug meets the rulemeister4.Doug's  a genius5.Doug saves roger (Roger finds out what its like to be picked on when Percy Femur comes to school)6.Doug's big news7.Doug's a big fat liar8.Doug wears tights9.Doug on the trail10.Doug meets roboboneDisc-31.Doug pumps up (Doug enters a fitness contest)2.Doug goes hollywood (When a famous hollywood director comes to town, everyone in Bluffington wants to star in his next movie)3.Doug's hot ticket4.Doug's dental disaster (Doug is worried about going to the dentist and starts day-dreaming about how Smash-Adams would handle it)5.Doug's lost weekend (Doug's addicted to playing his new video game for the weekend and never starts his homework)6.Doug's lucky hat (Doug finds a hat and believes its a good luck hat when good things start to happen)I hope these dvd sets sell enough for Amazon to quickly offer the last 2 seasons of the original Doug, not the evil "disney doug" and start offering my other favorites "The rugrats" "Catdog" and "The Angry beavers" season sets...
Title: Doug: Season 2

reviewText: After my mom's reaction to recieving Season 1 of Doug on Mother's Day I decided to get a jump on her birthday present and add to her collection.  The discs were in perfect condition and arrived early!
